ApproxsimClient.map.adapter
Class MapElementAdapter

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapDrawableAdapter
      ApproxsimClient.map.adapter.MapElementAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, ApproxsimObjectAdapter, ApproxsimEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ElementAdapter, MapActivityAdapter
public class MapElementAdapter
extends MapDrawableAdapter

MapElementAdapter adapts ApproxsimObjects descendants of Element and Activity for viewing on a map window.

Field Summary

setSelected

protected void setSelected(boolean selected)
Make adapter changes caused by selection state changes. This is protected for a reason, DO NOT USE THIS to set the selection status of the object adapted.

Parameters:
selected - true if it's selected.
